sentence.text: In the gene expression and network-level information, we revealed significant alterations of molecules related to response to hypoxia and metabolic pathways in the hypoxic-conditioned lung cancer cells.
We also observed that glycogen biosynthetic process and HK2 are downstream of response to hypoxia pathway important in hypoxia-conditioned lung cancer cell.
Furthermore, we used publicly available datasets to validate that the late-stage lung adenocarcinoma patients showed higher expression HK2 and glycogen biosynthetic process than early-stage ones.
In terms of prognostic features, a survival analysis revealed that the high glycogen biosynthetic process and HK2 expression group exhibited poorer survival in lung adenocarcinoma patients.
